citation.quoteText: Help me, Obi-Wan Kenobi. You’re my only hope.
citation.author: Leia Organa

citation.quoteText: I find your lack of faith disturbing.
citation.author: Darth Vader

citation.quoteText: It’s the ship that made the Kessel run in less than twelve parsecs. I’ve outrun Imperial starships. Not the local bulk cruisers, mind you. I’m talking about the big Corellian ships, now. She’s fast enough for you, old man.
citation.author: Han Solo

citation.quoteText: The Force will be with you. Always.
citation.author: Obi-Wan Kenobi

citation.quoteText: Why, you stuck-up, half-witted, scruffy-looking nerf herder!
citation.author: Leia Organa

citation.quoteText: Do. Or do not. There is no try.
citation.author: Yoda

citation.quoteText: When gone am I, the last of the Jedi will you be. The Force runs strong in your family. Pass on what you have learned.
citation.author: Yoda

citation.quoteText: I’ll never turn to the dark side. You’ve failed, your highness. I am a Jedi, like my father before me.
citation.author: Luke Skywalker
